member.name: T:Terraprisma.Launcher.GameLaunchers.Steam.StreamDataProvider
member.summary: Provides sometimes-platform-dependent data for Steam, such as paths.

member.name: M:Terraprisma.Launcher.GameLaunchers.Steam.StreamDataProvider.GetSteamInstallPath
member.summary: Finds the platform-dependent Steam installation path.
member.returns: The existing path to the system's Steam install, or if no path could be found or none exist.

member.name: T:Terraprisma.Launcher.MainCommand
member.summary: The main command of the launcher.

member.name: P:Terraprisma.Launcher.MainCommand.LauncherDirectory
member.summary: The directory of the launcher, where patches should be installed to.

member.name: P:Terraprisma.Launcher.MainCommand.TerrariaPath
member.summary: The directory of the Terraria installation, assumed to be the directory above the launcher directory if not specified.

member.name: T:Terraprisma.Launcher.Patcher.IPatchProvider
member.summary: Provides an arbitrary amount of game patches.
